alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 11:47AM EST until January 27 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially near Lake Michigan. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commutes today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to occasionally moderate snow today is expected to continue to hamper travel, especially over unplowed and secondary roads. More localized blowing and drifting is still possible over mainly open and rural areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Allow extra time to reach your destination.
